author: shdwcat (https://github.com/shdwcat)
name: markdown-wiki-links-preview-extended
description: Enables basic and advanced wikilinks in the Markdown Preview.

markdown-wiki-links-preview.urisuffix.description: The default suffix to use when creating the link to files. If blank, the suffix of the current file will be used.

markdown-wiki-links-preview.previewlabel.description: Changes how the link to a file should be shown, either with or without brackets.

markdown-wiki-links-preview.showextensio.description: Specifies whether or not to show the linked file's extension in the preview.

markdown-wiki-links-preview.descriptiont.description: States whether or not the description is the first item in the wikilink. On true: This means your wikilink syntax should look like [[desciption|file]]

markdown-wiki-links-preview.WikiLinksSep.patternErrorMessage: Warning: This separator will unfortunately not work - It would break the wikilink syntax.
markdown-wiki-links-preview.WikiLinksSep.markdownDescription: States what separator should be used - **Note: Special regex characters should be escaped! Example: '|' should be '\\|'**
